2018-10-09 • computer science deep learning python blog

list method for python

remove()

list.remove(value)

list = [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 3] 
print(list)
>> [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 3]
list.remove(3)
print(list)
>>[2, 4, 5, 6, 3]

del()

del list[index]

list = [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 3] 
print(list)
>> [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 3]
del list[2]
print(list)
>>[2, 3, 5, 6, 3]

pop()

list.pop(index)

list = [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 3] 
print(list)
>> [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 3]
top = list.pop(2)
print(top, list)
>>4 [2, 4, 5, 6, 3]
